message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair start!
You got lucky last round, but I'm not going to let you have all the fun!
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'm not falling for it!
I'm not afraid to take a risk, but I think I can do better than that!
You're pushing your luck, Bob, but I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me, I'll make a bold move!
You're getting desperate, Bob, but I'll give you a chance to reconsider... again!
I'm not backing down, Alice, it's time to make a serious offer!
You're getting closer, Bob, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm making a last-ditch effort, Alice, let's end this!
You're running out of options, Bob, and I'm not giving up!
No more negotiations, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
